name: NervDao
description: NervDao is a decentralized application on Nervos Network's CKB, enhancing user interaction with the Nervos DAO. Using wallet abstraction via the Common Chain Connector, it supports wallets like MetaMask, Unisat, OKX Wallet, and JoyID, enabling easy CKB deposits and withdrawals. Users earn rewards while protecting assets from dilution. NervDao offers automatic reward compounding, a one-month minimum lockup, and plans to improve UI, add NFT credentials, and expand wallet support for greater accessibility.

highlights.title: iCKB Protocol Integration
highlights.description: Integrates with the iCKB protocol, enabling seamless deposit and withdrawal of Nervos Dao assets

highlights.title: Visualized Process of Nervos DAO
highlights.description: Simplify opreations on Nervos DAO, with visualized process hint

related.title: iCKB
related.desc: iCKB is a dApp on Nervos CKB, enhancing the Nervos DAO by offering a liquid staking token

faq.a: NervDao integrates with the iCKB protocol, enabling seamless deposit and withdrawal of Nervos Dao assets, simplifying operations on Nervos DAO with visualized process hints.
